name: Falling Object Simulator
description:
This game is what most people might think of as one of the first projects you undertake as a video game programmer and/or video game developer.

Since I am a little beyond that point in my video game making career, I just made that game, but much more polished.

Move the paddle left/right  to collect the balls as they fall down!

Play for your highest score!
(Mine is 3075!)
